content.question: Which of the following studies demonstrates a cross-sectional research design?

choices.label: Testing the first graders, and testing them again when they are in third grade
Testing first, third, and fifth graders at the beginning of the school year
Observing first graders as they test in two different subject areas
Observing first graders as they interact with either third graders or fifth graders

content.answer: Testing first, third, and fifth graders at the beginning of the school year

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
